# classDescriptions(inSuite:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the class descriptions contained in the suite identified by `suiteName`.

## Declaration

```swift
func classDescriptions(inSuite suiteName: String) -> [String : NSScriptClassDescription]?
```

## Discussion

Each class description (instance of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSScriptClassDescription]) in the returned dictionary is identified by class name.

## Getting and Registering Class Descriptions

- **classDescription(withAppleEventCode:)**: Returns the class description associated with the given four-character Apple event code, `code`.
- **register(_:)**: Registers class description `classDescription` for use by Cocoa’s built-in scripting support by storing it in a per-suite internal dictionary under the class name.
